title: Erupting Volcano (Cotopaxi), South America, September 1853
provenance: Gift of Louis P. Church; Frederic E. Church
medium: Brush and oil paint on paper
description: An erupting volcano is seen at center, with the cone covered with gray lava and the summit aglow. A stream meanders in the left foreground.
name: Drawing
